products.title: Utopia White Roller Blind
products.description: The crispness of a bright white can really liven up any space, and this plain, clean fabric is no exception. You can instantly refresh your home with this blind that will look just as well in any design scheme thanks to its elegant simplicity. The weave is heavier than you might the crispness of a bright white can really liven up any space, and this plain, clean fabric is no exception.

products.title: Utopia Vanilla Roller Blind
products.description: Subtle, bright and stylishly neutral, this blind will usher the light into your home and reinvigorate any room with modest sophistication. That neutral hue, combined with hard-wearing practicality, allow this versatile gem to be fitted anywhere in the home, so you can have all t subtle, bright and stylishly neutral, this blind will usher the light into your home and reinvigorate any room with modest sophistication.

products.title: Utopia White Vertical Blind
products.description: The sharpness of white is softened by a subtle woven texture to this clean, bright fabric, which dazzles with its classy simplicity. Combine that with the robust practicality of a vertical blind and you have a versatile window covering thatll bring luminosity to any space.

products.title: Utopia Vanilla Vertical Blind
products.description: Utopia vanilla not only works the practicality card but the beauty card too. The blind is strewn through with creamy tones. The texture is simple, allowing light to gentle diffuse through the fabric.
